backend/main.mo: Canister implements application submission, user profiles, Stripe config, access control, and admin-only queries using storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report documenting updates required for the FAQs page with submission instructions and 2026 competition timeline.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing styling, pages, hooks, and behavior.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the document title and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all pages using a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main outlet structure.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with competition details, quick links, mission text, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive navigation header displaying competition branding and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing access control and refetching dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateCheckoutSess: React Query mutation creating Stripe checkout sessions and validating returned session URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hooks handling login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to check Stripe configuration and finalize applications by building and submitting an Application object.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and global background styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/ApplyPage.tsx: Renders an application page with a card and button linking to an external JotForm application form.
frontend/src/pages/FaqsPage.tsx: Displays a FAQ section using accordion components inside a styled card layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero section and feature cards promoting the music competition.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment cancellation notice with explanations and navigation options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Handles postâ€‘payment logic by verifying Stripe status, submitting the application draft, and showing success or error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, syncing them to sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the music competition website.
